lines.text: Who loves orange soda?
K-K-Kel loves orange soda.
Is it true? Is it TRUUUUE?
MMMHHMMM! I do, I do, I do-oooh!
Aw, here it goes.
Oh, you know that reminds me. Kel I think we left our...
[thinks for an excuse]
donkey in the kitchen.

[they go in the kitchen and Kel looks around for a donkey]
Kenan, where's the donkey we left in here?
There's no donkey in here!
What, you mean he ran away? Well, maybe we can catch him!
[opens the door and runs out]
Donkey! Come on donkey, come back! Donkey please! We love you, donkey!
[Kenan closes the door and Kel can be faintly heard yelling donkey at the top of his lungs]
[repeated line]
WHY?

[while sneaking up behind Kenan, who is rummaging through his locker]
BOO!

[jumps and bangs his head on his locker]
Man, don't do that!
How come?
Because I don't like starting off my day with a concussion. Call me unusual.
Kel, grab a clown, a flagpole, and a submarine, and meet me in my room! Come on, Buffalo Bottoms!
[Runs away]
Kenan, how am I gonna carry all of that stuff? Well, I guess I could put the clown and the flagpole inside the submarine, but it still SEEMS RATHER DIFFICULT! Aww, here it goes!
[repeated line]
Ah here goes!
[repeated line]
WHYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY?

[enters Rigby's]
What's happenin'?
Kel, could you please toss me the duster?
[grabs a can of peas and chucks it at him]
Oh! Ah! What did you do that for?
Well, you told me to throw a can of peas at ya.
I asked you to toss me the *duster!*
Oh, I'm sorry. It sounded like you said throw a can of peas at ya.
Why would I ask you to throw a can of peas at me?
I don't know. I thought it seemed kind of strange.
YOU SEEM KIND OF STRANGE!
[he leaves]
Sheesh, what's his problem?
Kel, you just hit the man with a can of food!
[repeated line heard at the end of the first two seasons]

[narrating]
"Kenan & Kel" was recorded in front of a live audience at Nickelodeon Studios Orlando at Universal Studios, Florida.
Kel, grab a brain, a heart, and some courage, and meet me at the Emerald City! Now come on, Ozzy!
Kenan, I already have a heart, and
[deep voice]
courage! Kenan? Aww... here it goes!
[Kenan and Kel are being chased by bikers in the middle of a biker bar]

[to distract the bikers]
Look, the Great Wall Of China!
[All of the bikers stop, including Kel, and they all stare into the direction of where Kenan pointed, as if the Great Wall Of China were really there]

[approaches Kel]
Kel.
Shh, Kenan, I'm looking at the Great Wall Of China.

[yelling in his ear]
There ain't no Great Wall Of China over there! I mean, run!
[the bikers continue the chase around the bar]
Shiny cow. Shiny cow. Mooo.

[while taking inventory of potatoes in the store]
One potato, two potato, three potato, four.
Kenan, I don't touch a tarantula.
